actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-1035.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 249 - 160 (Record Vote No: 388).

official_title: A resolution to authorize the Speaker to entertain motions to suspend the rules of the House on any day for the remainder of this Congress.

summary.text: Authorizes the Speaker of the House of Representatives to entertain motions to suspend the rules of the House on any day for the remainder of the 100th Congress.

titles.title: A resolution to authorize the Speaker to entertain motions to suspend the rules of the House on any day for the remainder of this Congress.
